about_the_game:
This is an adventure journey of swords and magic, and we are a group of mercenaries breaking free from professional constraints.

The core gameplay of the game focuses on dungeon exploration, combat, and escape in dungeons. Moreover, we have added more freedom and fun gameplay elements and will continue to update and maintain the game.

key Features

  • More profession skills, more talent combinations, with thousands of combinations to create your exclusive profession.
  • More interactive items and game effects.
  • Exclusively developed replay system and reporting system, aimed at preventing cheating and hacking while promoting a fair gaming environment.

We can be resolute warriors, wise wizards, devout priests, or fierce barbarians. We believe that their respective skills, when combined, can create surprising and delightful effects in various combat scenarios. Just imagine:

Firing an explosive arrow, the arrow will explode upon hitting an oil lamp, causing area damage.

Enchanting the sword with fire makes the sword scorching hot, inflicting continuous burns on the wielder, which can be alleviated by sheathing it.

Launching a lightning arrow, when it hits a water-based shield, not only negating the shield but also causing additional continuous damage.

These are the directions we continuously explore and persistently develop during our game development.
detailed_description:
This is an adventure journey of swords and magic, and we are a group of mercenaries breaking free from professional constraints.

The core gameplay of the game focuses on dungeon exploration, combat, and escape in dungeons. Moreover, we have added more freedom and fun gameplay elements and will continue to update and maintain the game.

key Features

  • More profession skills, more talent combinations, with thousands of combinations to create your exclusive profession.
  • More interactive items and game effects.
  • Exclusively developed replay system and reporting system, aimed at preventing cheating and hacking while promoting a fair gaming environment.

We can be resolute warriors, wise wizards, devout priests, or fierce barbarians. We believe that their respective skills, when combined, can create surprising and delightful effects in various combat scenarios. Just imagine:

Firing an explosive arrow, the arrow will explode upon hitting an oil lamp, causing area damage.

Enchanting the sword with fire makes the sword scorching hot, inflicting continuous burns on the wielder, which can be alleviated by sheathing it.

Launching a lightning arrow, when it hits a water-based shield, not only negating the shield but also causing additional continuous damage.

These are the directions we continuously explore and persistently develop during our game development.
name: Dark Killing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 / AMD R9 Fury
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: We venture into forbidden lands in pursuit of wealth, plundering the treasures of tomb, defeating evil creatures, and even eliminating fellow adventurers who dare to enter this place, looting them entirely. Then, before darkness completely engulfs us, we seek hidden portals to escape,
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
